problem_text_cn: 如图,在Rt△ABC中,∠ACB=90°,AC=4,BC=3,将△ABC绕AC所在的直线旋转一周得到一个旋转体,则该旋转体的侧面积为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in Rt△ABC, ∠ACB = N_0, AC = N_1, BC = N_2, rotate △ABC around the line where AC is located to obtain a rotating body, then the lateral area of ​​the rotating body is ()
raw_answer: 解:由勾股定理得AB=5,BC=3,则圆锥的底面周长=6π,旋转体的侧面积=\frac{1}{2}×6π×5=15π,故选:B．
raw_comment: 本题利用了勾股定理,圆的周长公式和扇形面积公式求解．
